biography: Lauri, a familiar face from Pickala Golf Club, is known for his calm demeanor and strategic play on the course. While he maintains a relatively low profile off the green, his dedication to the sport is evident in his consistent participation in the Hector Trophée.

Having participated in four previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Lauri's experience is a valuable asset. Although the Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Lauri is expected to appear at Hector Trophée 2025.

Lauri's precise and thoughtful approach to the game makes him a formidable competitor, and his fellow players would describe him as a true gentleman on and off the course. He is well-respected for his sportsmanship and dedication.
